on 2 sts rib 3 work 3 row more in rib cast off in rib disclaimer please note that all quantities are based on average usage and therefore are approximate we cannot accept responsibility for the finished garment if any other yarn than the one specified is used although every effort had been made to ensure that instructions are correct west yorkshire spinners cannot accept any liabilities
